items.name: case cancelled
items.desc: The system cancels the requested operation before it completes.

items.name: case cloudServiceCapabilityMissing
items.desc: The operation can’t complete because iCloud services aren’t in an enabled state.

items.name: case networkConnectionFailed
items.desc: The operation fails because the device can’t connect to the network.

items.name: case notFound
items.desc: The operation fails because the system can’t find the requested identifier in the current storefront.

items.name: case notSupported
items.desc: The requested operation fails because the system doesn’t support it.

items.name: case permissionDenied
items.desc: The operation can’t complete because the user doesn’t have permission for the request.

items.name: case unknown
items.desc: The requested operation can’t complete due to an unknown error.
